bibl.title: Arae. The Curse Poetry of Antiquity. (ARCA. Classical and Medieval Texts, Papers and Monographs. 26.)
bibl.note: Refers to P.G.M. - See in part. pp. 56-62: The Strasbourg Epode [P. Stras. Hellenistic Curse Poetry: The Texts [including Euphorion, ÉAra€ and Yròj]. - Pp. 260-263: Addendum [brief discussion of P. Brux. II, 22]. <Arai, Thraix>
WATSON Lindsay C., Arae. The Curse Poetry of Antiquity. (ARCA. Classical and Medieval Texts, Papers and Monographs. 26.)
